ARABIC: يَعْلَمُ خَآئِنَةَ ٱلْأَعْيُنِ وَمَا تُخْفِى ٱلصُّدُورُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He knows the eyes' deceit and what people's breasts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Known to Him is the treachery of the eye, and what the breasts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He knows even the most stealthy glance of the eyes and all the secrets that hearts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God knows the disloyalty of the eyes and what the hearts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Allah well knows the covert glance and all what lies hidden in the hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah knows the fraud of the eyes, and all that the breasts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He knows the stealthy looks and that which the breasts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He knows the treachery of the eyes and what the breasts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He knoweth the traitor of the eyes, and that which the bosoms hide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [for] He is aware of the [most] stealthy glance, and of all that the hearts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He knoweth the fraudulence of the eyes, and that which the breasts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He knows the treachery of the eyes, and what the breasts hide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Allah) knows of (the tricks) that deceive with the eyes, and all that the hearts (of men) conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah knows the fraud of the eyes, and all that the breasts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (Allah) knows the furtive looks of the eyes and what the chests conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He knows the deceptions of the eyes, and what the hearts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He knows that which deceives the eyes and what the breasts conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:19] He, namely, God, knows the treachery of the eyes, when it steals a glance at what is prohibited [for it to look at], and what the breasts hide — [what] the hearts [hide].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He knoweth the traitor of the eyes) the glance after the second glance of treachery, (and that which the bosoms hide) He knows also what is people's chests after the second glance.
